title: 6. IRRI Agronomy Challenge: Rat and Bird Control (13 January 2012)

tasks.task: Assess and manage rat infestations in a rice field
subtasks: Evaluate field conditions for potential rat entry points
Consider historical rat activity and existing control measures
Implement trap crops to deter and capture rats
Understand rat breeding patterns and timing for effective control
Utilize physical barriers such as rat fences to prevent entry

tasks.task: Monitor and deter bird activity to protect the seed
subtasks: Investigate local methods for bird control, such as visual deterrents
Address environmental factors that attract birds (e.g., irrigation canals)
Consider the sequence of agricultural operations to minimize bird congregation areas

tasks.task: Inspect field for signs of structural damage or seismic activity
subtasks: Check for earthquake-related issues impacting field stability
Assess the need for structural reinforcements or adjustments
Report any findings to relevant authorities or departments.
